channel.title: Nardah project[508/525]
channel.description:
[CENTER]Hey guys welcome to the Nardah project thread. since my 508 was a complete fail im gonna give this one a go. this project i'm not allown so i wont give up!
Base: Interrupted 525 (palidino)
Coders: eddie(nardah)
About the name the Server Name comes from the Home town Thats also called Nardah.
Server Goal: Trying to make a server thats fun to play and doesnt get boring to fast so skills wont be to fast but also not to slow, there will be Quests to do, that are fun. Also Most Non-cb Skills ( will be alot off work ). Also Pvm, Godwars, Jungel Demon ( gonna try make this a nice boss whit some cool effects and drops. and more.
[ul]Skills
Combat- [*]Pvp [*]Pvm [*Prayer- [*]bury [*]Altar Range- [*]Pvp [*]Pvm Mage- [*]Pvp [*]Pvm [*]Misc [*]Summoning- [*]All usefull Summoning Beasts. [*]Beast off burners
Runecrafting- [*]RuneCrafting Whit Abby's [*]RuneCrafting Whit Tabs
Agility- [*]Gnome [*]Wildy
Crafting- [*]Gem Crafting [*]Leather Crafting [*]GlassBlowing
Fletching- [*]Cutting [*]String Firemaking- [*]Burning [*]Clipped Firemaking
Woodcutting- [*]All Trees (Also teak mahony...) [*]Tree Falling
Fishing- [*]All type off fish
Cooking- [*]All Fish
Mining- [*]All Rocks
Smithing- [*]Smelting [*]Smiting [*]Dfs, Dragon Sq, Godsword making on anvil
Farming- [*]Fruit Trees [*]Herbs
Herblore- [*]Unf pot making [*]Full pot making [*]Grinding [*]Interface
Hunter- [*]Lizards
Slayer- [*]Tasks [*]Reward Shop
Thieving- [*]Pickpocketing
Quests: [*]Demon Slayer a quest where 3 demons are attacking nardah, you have to slay the demons and you will get a nice reward.
Minigames Duel Arena- [*]-Friendly [*]-Staking Barrows- [*]-Tunnels Custom minigame- [*]- no ideas yet il add more soon[/ul]
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2chkewy.png[/img]
[/CENTER]
